title: Paul Walker (Arctic explorer)
summary: Paul Walker is an Arctic explorer and Polar Guide.  He was born in Shrewsbury, England on 09 March 1966. He achieved a B.Ed Honours degree in Outdoor Education and Mathematics and has organised more than 250 arctic expeditions to Spitsbergen (Svalbard), Baffin Island (Canada), Iceland and Greenland over 32 years. In 2006 he led an 8 man team to make the first and only winter ascent of Gunnbjørnsfjeld, the highest mountain in the Arctic Circle. Paul is married and has three children.
